level.heading: Enforcement.
level.text: The payment of wages required under this subchapter shall be consistent with and subject to the provisions of Chapter 13 of Title 32.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 2-220.04 and ยง 2-220.06.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 16-118
level.text: For Law 16-118, see notes following ยง 2-220.01.
